Interface GameEdition

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameEditionImpl, JpaGameEdition
public interface GameEdition
Interface representing a specific edition of a game. Defines the basic properties and behaviors of a game edition entity.

Related tables: - GAME: Many-to-one relationship (each edition belongs to one game).
